prompts: Create a dragon-like Pokemon that breathes fire and has powerful wings.
I want an intimidating fire-type Pokemon with orange and black features to showcase.
Generate an image of a majestic fire and flying Pokemon soaring through the skies.
Make a fierce bipedal Pokemon with a fiery demeanor and sharp claws.
Imagine a legendary Pokemon with a fiery tail and a charismatic personality.
Design a starter Pokemon that evolves into a powerful fire-type dragon.
Show me a Pokemon with vibrant colors and a dynamic battle stance in a forest setting.
